properties.description: A dataset
The names of the organizations or individuals that developed the data set.
properties.title: Originators

properties.description: The date when the data set is published or otherwise made available for release.
properties.title: Publish Date

properties.description: The unique identifier for the deployment.
properties.title: Camera Deployment ID

properties.description: A characterization of the data set, including its intended use and limitations.
properties.title: Description

properties.description: Use the format: 19000101 for Dec 1, 1900.
properties.title: Camera Deployment Begin Date

properties.description: The state of and maintenance information for the data set.
properties.title: Status

properties.description: The state of the data set.
properties.title: Progress

properties.description: The frequency with which changes and additions are made to the data set after the initial data set is completed.
properties.title: Maintenance and Update Frequency

properties.description: The geographic areal domain of the data set.
properties.title: Spatial Domain

properties.description: Short description of the geographic areal domain of the dataset.
properties.title: Description of Geographic Extent

properties.description: the limits of coverage of a data set expressed by latitude and longitude values in the order western-most, eastern-most, northern-most, and southern-most. For data sets that include a complete band of latitude around the earth, the West Bounding Coordinate shall be assigned the value -180.0, and the East Bounding Coordinate shall be assigned the value 180.0
properties.title: Bounding Coordinates

properties.description: Western-most coordinate of the limit of coverage expressed in longitude.
properties.title: West Bounding Coordinate

properties.description: Eastern-most coordinate of the limit of coverage expressed in longitude.
properties.title: East Bounding Coordinate

properties.description: Northern-most coordinate of the limit of coverage expressed in latitude.
properties.title: North Bounding Coordinate

properties.description: Southern-most coordinate of the limit of coverage expressed in latitude.
properties.title: South Bounding Coordinate

properties.description: Words or phrases summarizing an aspect of the data set.
properties.title: Keywords

properties.description: Subjects covered by the data set.
properties.title: Theme

properties.description: reference to a formally registered thesaurus or a similar authoritative source of theme keywords
properties.title: Theme Keyword Thesaurus

properties.description: Common-use word or phrase used to describe the subject of the data set.
properties.title: Theme Keyword

properties.description: Geographic locations characterized by the data set.
properties.title: Place

properties.description: Reference to a formally registered thesaurus or a similar authoritative source of place keywords.
properties.title: Place Keyword Thesaurus

properties.description: The geographic name of a location covered by this data set.
properties.title: Place Keyword

properties.description: Information on the taxa (1 or more) included in the data set, including keywords, taxonomic system and coverage information, and taxonomic classification system.
properties.title: Taxonomy

properties.description: Taxonomic ranks or common groups characterized by the data set.
properties.title: Keywords/Taxon

properties.description: Reference to a formally registered thesaurus or similar authoritative source of taxonomic keywords.
properties.title: Taxonomic Keyword Thesaurus

properties.description: Common-use words or phrases describing the taxonomy covered by the data set.
properties.title: Taxonomic Keywords

properties.description: The name representing the taxonomic rank of the taxon being described.
properties.title: Kingdom level - Value

properties.description: Taxonomic ranks or common groups characterized by the data set.
properties.title: Species Level

properties.description: The name of the taxonomic rank.
properties.title: Taxonomic Rank Name

properties.description: The name representing the taxonomic rank of the taxon being described.
properties.title: Taxonomic Rank Value

properties.description: Specification of applicable common name.
properties.title: Applicable Common Name

properties.description: Access constraints convey the IUCN status of the deployment based on the species of animals contained with in it.
properties.title: Access Constraints

properties.prefix:
Valid Values:
  • LC Least Concern
  • NT Near Threatened
  • VU Vulnerable
  • EN Endangered
  • CR Critically Endangered
  • EW Extinct in the Wild
  • EX Extinct
  • DD Data Deficient
  • NE Not Evaluated
  • US User Specified

properties.description: A characterization of the data set, including its intended use and limitations.
properties.title: Use Constraints

properties.description: Recognition of those who contributed to the data set.
properties.title: Data Set Credit

properties.description: A general assessment of the quality of the data set.
properties.title: Data Quality Information

properties.description: Information about omissions, selection criteria, generalization, definitions used, and other rules used to derive the data set
properties.title: Camera Failure Details

properties.description: Information about the events, parameters, and source data which constructed the data set, and information about the responsible parties.
properties.title: Lineage

properties.description: Information about a single step of field and/or lab work.
properties.title: Bait Method

properties.description: The type of methodology being documented.
Reference to a formally registered thesaurus or a similar authoritative source of methodology keywords.
properties.title: Bait Type Thesaurus

properties.description: Equivalent to 'Materials and Methods' in a journal article. Describe the physical methods used to gather the data, the experimental design, sample frequency, treatments or strata, statistical and spatial design of the sampling and sample completeness, representatives, and biases.
properties.title: Bait Description

properties.description: The type of methodology being documented.
Reference to a formally registered thesaurus or a similar authoritative source of methodology keywords.
properties.title: Feature Thesaurus

properties.description: Equivalent to 'Materials and Methods' in a journal article. Describe the physical methods used to gather the data, the experimental design, sample frequency, treatments or strata, statistical and spatial design of the sampling and sample completeness, representatives, and biases.
properties.title: Feature Type Methodology

properties.description: For example: type 19000101 for Jan 1, 1900.
properties.title: Proposed Camera Deployment Begin Date

properties.description: For example: type 19000101 for Jan 1, 1900.
properties.title: Proposed Camera Deployment End Date

properties.description: The description of the reference frame for, and the means to encode, coordinates in the data set.
properties.title: Spatial Reference Information

properties.description: The reference frame or system from which linear or angular quantities are measured and assigned to the position that a point occupies.
properties.title: Horizontal Coordinate System Definition

properties.description: The quantities of latitude and longitude which define the position of a point on the Earth's surface with respect to a reference spheroid.
properties.title: Geographic

properties.description: Units of measure used for the latitude and longitude values.
properties.title: Geographic Coordinate Units

properties.description: The reference frame or system from which vertical distances (altitudes or depths) are measured.
properties.title: Vertical Coordinate System Definition

properties.description: the reference frame or system from which altitudes (elevations) are measured.
properties.title: Altitude System Definition

properties.description: The identification given to the surface taken as the surface of reference from which altitudes are measured.
properties.title: Altitude Datum Name

properties.description: The minimum distance possible between two adjacent altitude values, expressed in Altitude Distance Units of Measure.
properties.title: Elevation

properties.description: Units in which altitudes are recorded.
properties.title: Altitude Distance Units

properties.default_value: Explicit elevation coordinate included with horizontal coordinates
properties.description: The means used to encode the altitudes.

index.key: Explicit elevation coordinate included with horizontal coordinates

options.index: Explicit elevation coordinate included with horizontal coordinates

properties.title: Altitude Encoding Method

properties.description: Details about the Camera equipment and settings used on the deployment.
properties.title: Camera Settings

properties.description: Information on the currentness of the metadata information, and the responsible party.
properties.title: Metadata Reference Information

properties.description: The date that the metadata were created or last updated.
properties.title: Metadata Date

properties.description: The date of the latest review of the metadata entry.
properties.title: Metadata Review Date

properties.description: The date by which the metadata entry should be reviewed.
properties.title: Metadata Future Review Date

properties.description: The party responsible for the metadata information.
properties.title: Metadata Contact

properties.description: cntperp
properties.title: cntperp

properties.description: The party responsible for the metadata.
properties.title: Contact Person

properties.description: The name of the contact person's organization.
properties.title: Organization Name

properties.default_value: FGDC Biological Data Profile of the Content Standard for Digital Geospatial Metadata
properties.description: The name of the metadata standard used to document the data set.
properties.title: Metadata Standard Name

properties.description: Identification of the version of the metadata standard used to document the data set.
properties.title: Metadata Standard Version
